resources.string: The average of first 50 natural numbers is …………. .
A fraction which bears the same ratio to 1/27 as 3/11 bear to 5/9 is equal to ……….. .
The number of 3-digit numbers divisible by 6, is ………….. .
A clock strikes once at 1 o’clock, twice at 2 o’clock, thrice at 3 o’clock and so on.How many times will it strike in 24 hours?
Thermal energy is the __________ of the particles in a material.
Refrigerators use the process of __________ to remove heat from the interiors.
The moving particles in an object have __________ energy.
If the particles in an object begin to move more quickly, their average kinetic energy __________ and the object\'s temperature __________.
How many people ___ in your family?
I get up at 8 o\'clock ___ morning.
